data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Rennes in their own half.
In the minute 2, Nice's Amine Gouiri gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Rivera. But the effort is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
Nice to take a throw-in in Rennes territory.
In the minute 5, Rennes have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
In Nice Rennes attack through Hamari Traore. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
In the minute 6, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Nice.
Can Rennes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
In the minute 8, Nice are coming forward and Jeff Reine-Adelaide gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Rennes at Allianz Rivera.
Rennes have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Amaury Delerue signals a Rennes throw-in in Nice's half.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Rennes.
In the minute 12, Nice pushes forward through Alexis Claude-Maurice, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
Throw-in for Rennes in the half of Nice.
In the minute 14, Jeremy Doku (Rennes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
Rennes drive upfield and Nayef Aguerd gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nice defender.
In the minute 15, Rennes have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Amaury Delerue awards Nice a goal kick.
Amaury Delerue awards Rennes a goal kick.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Nice in the half of Rennes.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Rennes in the half of Nice.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
Adrien Truffert of Rennes smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 25, Rennes drives forward and Faitout Maouassa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Rennes have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Rennes's Eduardo Camavinga goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 25, Can Rennes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nice's half?
Amaury Delerue awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nice close to the penalty box.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Rennes at Allianz Rivera.
Rennes to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
Rennes take a 0-1 lead thanks to Mbaye Niang.
In the minute 28, Adrien Truffert with an assist there.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Nice.
In the minute 30, Flavius Daniliuc (Nice) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Jeff Reine-Adelaide for Nice gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Rennes goal kick.
In the minute 31, Nice are whistled for offside.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Amaury Delerue signals a Nice throw-in in Rennes's half.
In the minute 33, Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rennes's half?
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rennes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jeff Reine-Adelaide (Nice) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Rennes.
In the minute 38, Nice attack but Amine Gouiri's header doesn't find the target.
Rennes have a goal kick.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Rennes.
Nice's Amine Gouiri misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 42, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 44, Throw-in high up the field for Nice in Nice.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nice.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Rennes push forward at Allianz Rivera and Eduardo Camavinga gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nice defence.
Rennes have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
In the minute 50, Free kick Rennes.
Rennes's Faitout Maouassa breaks free at Allianz Rivera. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Amaury Delerue awards Nice a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Nice to take a throw-in in Rennes territory.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Rennes.
In the minute 56, In Nice Nice drive forward through Alexis Claude-Maurice. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Rennes in the half of Nice.
In the minute 57, Can Rennes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
Nice make their first substitution with Kasper Dolberg replacing Alexis Claude-Maurice.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 59, Free kick Nice.
Nice's Danilo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Rennes at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 61, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Danilo for Nice who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Rennes.
Hamari Traore (Rennes) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 63, It seems as if Danilo is unable to continue. Robson Bambu replaces him for the home team.
Throw-in for Rennes in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Rennes in the half of Nice.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benjamin Bourigeaud is replacing Clement Grenier for the away team.
In the minute 67, Rennes have a goal kick.
Faitout Maouassa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rennes.
Hamari Traore for Rennes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Amaury Delerue signals a throw-in for Nice, close to Rennes's area.
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 71, Stanley N`Soki (Nice) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Nice.
In the minute 75, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Rennes.
Kephren Thuram Ulien is replacing Hicham Boudaoui for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Rennes have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Rennes's Faitout Maouassa breaks free at Allianz Rivera. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
In the minute 77, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
Amaury Delerue signals a Nice throw-in in Rennes's half.
In the minute 80, Free kick in a good position for Rennes!
Julien Stephan is making the team's second substitution at Allianz Rivera with Georginio Rutter replacing Mbaye Niang.
Nayef Aguerd (Rennes) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
In the minute 84, In Nice a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nice needs to be cautious. Rennes have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Rennes.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Nice have a goal kick.
Amaury Delerue awards Rennes a goal kick.
In the minute 89, The away team replace Jeremy Doku with Martin Terrier.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Amaury Delerue signals a Rennes throw-in in Nice's half.
Rennes drive forward but Eduardo Camavinga is judged offside.
Ball safe as Rennes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Amaury Delerue blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
The away team have replaced Adrien Truffert with Flavien Tait. This is the fourth substitution made today by Julien Stephan.
Amine Gouiri (Nice) has received a first yellow card.
